titleStmt.title: Some considerations tending to the undeceiving those, whose judgements are misinformed by politique protestations, declarations, &c. Being a necessary discourse for the present times, concerning the unseasonable difference between the Protestant and the Puritan.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

titleStmt.title: Some considerations tending to the undeceiving those, whose judgements are misinformed by politique protestations, declarations, &c. Being a necessary discourse for the present times, concerning the unseasonable difference between the Protestant and the Puritan.
